content: k instep in pattern 28 32 36 round 15 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end k1 ssk k until 3 sts before instep sts of instep k2tog k1 repeat once to eor k2tog k1 32 40 48 sts round 2 k instep in pattern and k to end of round repeat round 15 until there are a total of 24 28 32 sts remaining repeat these two rounds until you ve reached your original stitch count 56 use kitchener stitch to graft the remaining 64 72 sts stitches to close the toe foot i am knitsiphappy on ravelry continue the foot in established pattern until for help or questions please email me at the length measures 2 /5cm shorter than nancy@knitsiphappy com your desired length cut mc and join cc for i d love to see your beautiful socks please the toe tag me on instagram @knitsiphappy and with #letsstayhomesocks let sstayhomesocks knitsiphappy2022 4 thispatternisforpersonaluseonly charts for 56 stitch sock chart is just worked on the front of the sock chart for 64 stitch sock chart is just worked on the front of the sock let sstayhomesocks knitsiphappy2022 5 thispatternisforpersonaluseonly chart for 72 stitch sock chart is just worked on the front of the sock let sstayhomesocks knitsiphappy2022 6 thispatternisforpersonaluseonly
